name: Hang Glider - A game made in 24 hours only wearing a VR headset
name_original: Hang Glider - A game made in 24 hours only wearing a VR headset
description:
STEP 0 - Land on the Finish Island

STEP1 - Move your arms to control the hang glider.

STEP 2 - Reset the level with (A) or (Start Button)

STEP 3 - Collect the stars as fast as you can

STEP 4 - ???

STEP 5 - Profit.
